G

GameController - Class in <Unnamed>
The main class of the Game responsible to bridge together, the View(Graphics of the Game) and the Model(Logic part of the Game)
GameController() - Constructor for class GameController
 
gameWon() - Method in class GameController
This method will return true if a player is defeated or has no more moves so the game has a winner
getBoardArea() - Method in class Model.BoardModel
Can access and return the whole game Board array that holds the Units
getDefeatedUnits() - Method in class Model.Player
Gets the player's Units that are currently defeated
getName() - Method in class Model.Player
this method can access the name of the player
getName() - Method in class Model.Unit
This method can access the name of the Unit
getPlayerUnits() - Method in class Model.Player
This method is responsible to access the array that holds the player's units and return it as an array when called.
getPositionX() - Method in class Model.Unit
This method can access the positionX value
getPositionY() - Method in class Model.Unit
This method can access the positionY value
getRank() - Method in class Model.Unit
This method can access the Rank of a Unit
getTeam() - Method in class Model.Player
Gets the Team of the Player
